links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..125
Vaclav Kotesovec, Asymptotic solution of the equations using the Lambert W-function
formula: a(n)=sum(k=1..n, ((sum(i=0..k, (-1)^i*(k-2*i)^n*binomial(k,i)))*2^(n-2*k))/k!), n>0, a(0)=1. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, May 29 2011From _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 06 2014: (Start)a(n) ~ exp(cosh(r)*sinh(r)-n) * n^(n+1/2) / (sqrt(cosh(2*r) + 2*r*sinh(2*r)) * r^(n+1/2)), where r is the root of the equation r*(cosh(r)^2 + sinh(r)^2) = n.(a(n)/n!)^(1/n) ~ 2*(exp(1/LambertW(4*n))/LambertW(4*n)).(End)
prog: (Maxima)a(n):=sum(((sum((-1)^i*(k-2*i)^n*binomial(k,i),i,0,k))*2^(n-2*k))/k!,k,1,n); [From Vladimir Kruchinin, May 29 2011](PARI) x='x+O('x^66); /* that many terms */Vec(serlaplace(exp(sinh(x)*cosh(x)))) /* show terms */ /* Joerg Arndt, May 29 2011 */
